channel.title: Events on fgaublog
channel.description: Recent content in Events on fgaublog

item.title: a long long metal weekend - never forgotten
item.description: munich just experienced the ultimate metal weekend as metallica rocked the city with back-to-back shows on friday and sunday.
item.content:
munich just experienced the ultimate metal weekend as metallica rocked the city with back-to-back shows on friday and sunday.

with unique setlists and unmatched energy, the metal gods delivered performances that will go down in history. fans were treated to two nights of iconic riffs, explosive power, and an unforgettable celebration of all things metallica.

a weekend that munich—and metalheads—will never forget!

item.title: 37c3 Unlocked
item.description: the 37th chaos communication congress (37C3) in hamburg provided a stimulating environment for technology enthusiasts and nerds alike.
item.content:
the 37th chaos communication congress (37C3) in hamburg provided a stimulating environment for technology enthusiasts and nerds alike.

from december 27th to 30th, 2023, thousands of individuals with a passion for technology gathered to delve into the latest advancements in security, cryptography, hardware and software hacking.

we had a lot of fun with a “hot or not” revival, as you can see from the pictures.

see you all at the 38c3!

item.title: 36c3 Resource Exhaustion
item.description: for the third time in a row the hacker community met for the 36c3 in leipzig. 4 days between christmas and new year, 4 days with and in a unique community.
item.content:
for the third time in a row the hacker community met for the 36c3 in leipzig. 4 days between christmas and new year, 4 days with and in a unique community.

lots of inspiration, lots of good talks, lots of hardware and software hacking. we had a lot of fun again.

item.title: cccamp19
item.description: climate-neutrally I biked this year to the chaos communication camp 2019.
item.content:
climate-neutrally I biked this year to the chaos communication camp 2019.

I didn’t notice that much, but the atmosphere was great.

item.title: 35c3 refreshing memories
item.description: for the second time, the messe (fair) leipzig was the the place to be for all hackers at the end of year 2018. fun, fun and spass am geraet.
item.content: for the second time, the messe (fair) leipzig was the the place to be for all hackers at the end of year 2018. fun, fun and spass am geraet.

item.title: 34c3 tuwat
item.description:
first things first. i have my lost laptop again - thank you, thank you Deutsche Bahn!

for the first time the messe (fair) leipzig was the new location for the nerds from all parts of the world.
item.content:
first things first. i have my lost laptop again - thank you, thank you Deutsche Bahn!

for the first time the messe (fair) leipzig was the new location for the nerds from all parts of the world.

the size of the halls was impressive and offered space for all high and low tech, for art and design and of course all sorts of light and sound installations. we had a lot of fun again (am Gerät).

item.title: 33c3 Work For Me
31c3 is over
item.description: the pyneo project is very happy to be part of the 31c3 in hamburg. our small team had a lot of fun with hard and software. samsung phones, a special tizen phone, gps tracker with gsm modems, bus pirates, serial consol finder workshop and so on. cool guys on a cool loacation with very interesting talks, thats the spirit during entertaining congress. i like it and i’m looking forward to the next year. 31c3 a new dawn!
item.content: the pyneo project is very happy to be part of the 31c3 in hamburg. our small team had a lot of fun with hard and software. samsung phones, a special tizen phone, gps tracker with gsm modems, bus pirates, serial consol finder workshop and so on. cool guys on a cool loacation with very interesting talks, thats the spirit during entertaining congress. i like it and i’m looking forward to the next year. 31c3 a new dawn!
